verses.name: Numbers 12:5
verses.text: And the Lord came down in the pillar of the cloud, and stood in the door of the tabernacle, and called Aaron and Miriam: and they both came forth.

verses.name: Numbers 12:6
verses.text: And he said, Hear now my words: If there be a prophet among you, I the Lord will make myself known unto him in a vision, and will speak unto him in a dream.

verses.name: Numbers 12:7
verses.text: My servant Moses is not so, who is faithful in all mine house.
